mention.text: `` MOSCOW -LRB- Reuters -RRB- - Russian President Vladimir Putin signed a law on Monday making the denial of Nazi crimes and distortion of the Soviet Union 's role in the World War Two a criminal offence punishable by up to five years in jail .

Russian President Vladimir Putin signed a law on Monday making the denial of Nazi crimes and distortion of the Soviet Union 's role in the World War Two a criminal offence punishable by up to five years in jail
a pillar to unite a society that Putin has said
a blogger critical of the authorities
a comment posted when the legislation was first introduced
